net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.data

Interface FilteredListModel<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the element in the model which the filter will be applied.
    All Superinterfaces:
    ListModel
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleFilteredListModel

    public interface FilteredListModel<T>
extends ListModel
    A FilteredListModel provides actions for registering filters which restricts the visibility of elements in the filter.
    Author:
    Ben Barber (bbarber@i2rd.com)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addListModelFilter(Predicate<T> filter)
      Add a list model filter to restrict the visibility of the elements in the model.
      void refilter()
      Trigger filtering of the model.
      void removeListModelFilter(Predicate<T> filter)
      Remove/unregister the passed filter.

      • Methods inherited from interface net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.data.ListModel

        addListDataListener, getElementAt, getElementIdAt, getSize, removeListDataListener

    • Method Detail

      • addListModelFilter

        void addListModelFilter(Predicate<T> filter)
        Add a list model filter to restrict the visibility of the elements in the model.
        Parameters:
        filter - the filter.

      • refilter

        void refilter()
        Trigger filtering of the model.

      • removeListModelFilter

        void removeListModelFilter(Predicate<T> filter)

        Parameters:
        filter - the filter to remove.
